text: Sir John Leslie Carrick (4 September 1918 â€“ 18 May 2018) was an Australian politician. He was born in Sydney. Carrick served as a Senator for New South Wales from 1971 to 1987, representing the Liberal Party. He was a minister for the duration of the Fraser Government, holding several different portfolios. Carrick died on 18 May 2018 at the age of 99 in Melbourne. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:Politicians from Sydney
title: John Carrick
